comments.author: Faisalul
comments.body: Quote from: skyNetwork on July 31, 2022, 10:31:20 AMMy project is nearly finalized Looking for serious promotion Advisor, parthership Advisor & social media Advisor4 Months ago i started the development of a new project which i can't give full details here for obvious reasons.The development of the project is at about 70% completed.I have funded the project development from scratch for over 4 Months now. There are in total of 4 persons working on this platform. 3 developers ( Website,  iOS and Android app)Budget I have drawn up a budget of $100,000 for  Marketing only, and I have already spent up to 60% of this for the development.I need a  Team member with the right Partnership, Promotion, Social media skills who somehow has experiences with StartUps/IDOI can offer % from IDO depends on your skills and after launch Team token.Contact me: https://t.me/MrWhiteDev

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Quote from: skyNetwork on July 31, 2022, 10:31:20 AMI can offer % from IDO depends on your skills and after launch Team token.Your IDO is pratically worthless since your project hasn't launched yet so it has no monetary value. i don't think anyone is likely to accept getting paid with your token, unless i guess, you somehow convinced them that your project is legit.
